sn45.26:1.2: “Mendicants, I will teach you a bad person and a worse person,
sn45.26:1.3: a good person and a better person.
sn45.26:1.5: And what is a bad person?
sn45.26:1.6: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, and wrong immersion.
sn45.26:1.7: This is called a bad person.
sn45.26:2.1: And what is a worse person?
sn45.26:2.2: It’s someone who has wrong view, wrong thought, wrong speech, wrong action, wrong livelihood, wrong effort, wrong mindfulness, wrong immersion, wrong knowledge, and wrong freedom.
sn45.26:2.3: This is called a worse person.
sn45.26:3.1: And what is a good person?
sn45.26:3.2: It’s someone who has right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, and right immersion.
sn45.26:3.3: This is called a good person.
sn45.26:4.1: And what is a better person?
sn45.26:4.2: It’s someone who has right view, right thought, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge, and right freedom.
sn45.26:4.3: This is called a better person.”
